thoughts.text: It looks like the 'check_twitter_credentials.py' file does not exist. I think I can use the 'google' command to search for solutions to the error message I received.
thoughts.reasoning: Searching for solutions to the error message I received can help me identify and fix any errors that may be preventing the tweet from being sent. The 'google' command is a good way to search for solutions.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'google' command to search for solutions to the error message I received
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time troubleshooting the tweet and instead focus on taking action and actually pursuing one of the activities.
